statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_security_logs;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, event_type FROM blockchain_security_logs WHERE source_address = '0x5a6d1d84B5eb664c8556631EAbE3a693f9e5C0fC';
SELECT timestamp, event_type, amount FROM blockchain_security_logs WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_address, destination_address FROM blockchain_security_logs WHERE event_type = 'Transfer' AND DATE(timestamp) = '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, event_type, details FROM blockchain_security_logs WHERE details->'$.severity' = 'HIGH' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT log_id, event_type, timestamp FROM blockchain_security_logs WHERE source_address = '0x1234567890' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_security_logs WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT timestamp, event_type, source_address, destination_address FROM blockchain_security_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC, log_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, event_type, details FROM blockchain_security_logs WHERE event_type = 'Transfer' ORDER BY log_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM blockchain_security_logs WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY event_type ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_monitoring;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash FROM blockchain_monitoring WHERE suspicious_activity = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM blockchain_monitoring ORDER BY transaction_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_logs WHERE ip_address = '127.0.0.1';
SELECT log_id, event_description, timestamp FROM blockchain_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash FROM blockchain_monitoring WHERE suspicious_activity = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_monitoring WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, event_description FROM blockchain_logs WHERE user_id = 105 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_logs WHERE ip_address LIKE '%.23%' ORDER BY log_id DESC;

SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash, transaction_type, suspicious_activity FROM blockchain_monitoring JOIN blockchain_logs ON blockchain_monitoring.transaction_id = blockchain_logs.user_id WHERE blockchain_logs.ip_address = '192.168.0.1';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_activity_logs;
SELECT id, timestamp, activity_type FROM suspicious_activity_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious';
SELECT user_id, timestamp, description FROM security_audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_activity_logs WHERE id = 10;
SELECT description, log_id FROM security_audit_logs WHERE actor_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT description, timestamp, activity_type FROM blockchain_activity_logs WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activity_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Unauthorized Access' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, logged_by_user_id FROM suspicious_activity_alerts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, action_type, actor_id FROM security_audit_logs WHERE remarks IS NOT NULL ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY block_number DESC, transaction_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'transfer';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, block_number FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT bt.transaction_id, bt.transaction_type, sal.suspicious_reason FROM blockchain_transactions bt JOIN suspicious_activity_logs sal ON bt.transaction_id = sal.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 100 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 10;

SELECT bt.transaction_id, bt.user_id, bt.block_number, bal.suspicious_reason FROM blockchain_transactions bt INNER JOIN suspicious_activity_logs bal ON bt.transaction_id = bal.transaction_id ORDER BY bt.block_number ASC, bal.log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, registration_date FROM blockchain_users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sar.report_title, sar.analysis_date, bu.username FROM security_analysis_reports sar LEFT JOIN blockchain_users bu ON sar.analyst_id = bu.user_id ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT hash, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, activity_type, description FROM suspicious_activity WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_logs WHERE action_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Fraud' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, action_type FROM user_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT address, balance FROM blockchain_addresses WHERE balance < 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Data Breach' AND status = true;
